sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Surplus Federal Property for Schools Act.

sections.heading: Title to any equipment and supplies acquired by the State of
sections.text:
Illinois under the provisions of Public Law 124, 79th Congress, 1st
Session, approved July 3, 1945, shall be vested in the school board of
the district that has possession and use of such property and supplies
on July 1, 1953.
